trans-unit.source: Specifies that a XAML namespace can be subsumed by another XAML namespace.
trans-unit.target: 指定 XAML 命名空間可被另一個 XAML 命名空間建立小計。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the subsuming XAML namespace is indicated in a previously defined <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，納入方的 XAML 命名空間會指定於先前定義的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: Applying the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute> enables an assembly to provide a new and compatible namespace for another XAML namespace, as previously indicated by <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 套用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute>可讓以新的和相容的命名空間提供另一個 XAML 命名空間，如先前所指定的組件<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: For example, `"http://www.adatum.com/2003/controls"` could be marked compatible with a defined XAML namespace identified as `"http://www.adatum.com/2005/controls"` through the following assembly-level attributes:
trans-unit.target: 例如，`"http://www.adatum.com/2003/controls"`無法標示為已定義的 XAML 命名空間識別為與相容`"http://www.adatum.com/2005/controls"`透過下列組件層級屬性：

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。
參考 XAML 命名空間識別項。
歸類 XAML 命名空間識別項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。
<paramref name="oldNamespace" /> 或 <paramref name="newNamespace" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the subsuming namespace identifier reported by this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性所報告的歸類命名空間識別項。

trans-unit.source: The subsuming namespace identifier reported in the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所報告的歸類命名空間識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the reference namespace identifier reported by this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性所報告的參考命名空間識別項。
